item.title: S30 E14: Snowstorms Europe, £1B Bayeux Tapestry Loan, Trump ISIS 'Gift' & China AI Chatbot Rules
item.description:
The regular discusses the approaching snowstorms hitting the northern hemisphere, a record breaking loan transfer of the Bayeux Tapestry to the British Museum, Trump’s present to ISIS in Nigeria as well as China introducing regulations on Artificial Intelligence amongst other things. *most, if not all of what’s been said is entirely satirical and has no intention of being taken as factual/legitimate sources or criticisms*

Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/610c3b70/podcast/rss

item.title: How hard is Luxembourgish B1 Level ? Your Complete Guide - Part 2
item.description:
“Anne, I was doing fine at A2… and now at B1 I feel stuck.”.

Grammar suddenly gets heavier.

Vocabulary explodes.

And progress feels slower, even though you’re actually learning regularly.

In Part 1 (Episode 98), we talked about why B1 feels like such a climb: the famous intermediate plateau.

And if that’s where you are right now: you’re not failing. You’re exactly where you should be.

Here’s the good news ????

B1 is doable... Feed: https://feeds.alitu.com/84212197
